info.title: RAG Chatbot API
info.description: API for the production RAG chatbot backend.

post.description:
Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token.
Corresponds to /api/auth/login from PRD.

Creates a new user.
Corresponds to /api/auth/register from PRD.
Provides a new access token from a valid refresh token.

get.description: Gets the profile of the currently authenticated user.

put.description: Updates the profile of the currently authenticated user.

post.description: Resets the user's password using a valid token.

get.description: Get all chats, sorted by last updated

schema.title: Response Get Chats Api V1 Askai Chats Get

post.description: Create a new chat session and start importing documents from Google Drive

get.description: Get all messages for a specific chat

schema.title: Response Get Chat Api V1 Askai Chats  Chat Id  Get

delete.description: Delete a chat session and its associated data

post.description: Send a message to a chat and get a RAG-based response
Upload a PDF for RAG processing. This is an asynchronous operation.

Scans a public Google Drive folder and adds its file structure to the chat
without downloading the files.

get.description: Get the status of an asynchronous upload job

parameters.name: job_id

schema.description: The ID of the upload job
schema.title: Job Id

parameters.description: The ID of the upload job

get.description: Get all active and processing documents for a specific chat

Streams document status for a chat using Server-Sent Events (SSE).
Sends an update whenever the status of a document processing job changes.

delete.description: Delete a specific PDF from a chat

get.summary: Get the latest daily tenders from the scraper
get.description:
Retrieves the most recent batch of tenders added by the scraper.
This represents the latest daily scrape run.
Get DMS summary statistics including total documents, storage used, etc.

schema.title: Response List Categories Api V1 Dms Categories Get

get.description:
List accessible folders with optional filtering.
Returns hierarchical folder structure with subfolders.

parameters.name: parent_id

schema.description: Filter by parent folder (null for root)
schema.title: Parent Id

parameters.description: Filter by parent folder (null for root)

schema.title: Response List Folders Api V1 Dms Folders Get

post.description:
Create a new folder.
Requires write permission on parent folder if specified.

get.description: Get folder details including document count and subfolders.

patch.description:
Update folder metadata (name, description, confidentiality level).
Requires admin permission on folder.

delete.description:
Soft delete folder (must be empty).
Requires admin permission on folder.

post.description:
Move folder to new parent and update materialized paths.
Requires admin permission on both source and destination.

get.description:
Get all permissions for a folder.
Requires admin permission on folder.

schema.title: Response List Folder Permissions Api V1 Dms Folders  Folder Id  Permissions Get

post.description:
Grant permission to user or department on folder.
Department admins can only grant permissions on their department's folders.

delete.description:
Revoke folder permission.
Requires admin permission on folder.

post.description:
Generate presigned upload URL for direct file upload from frontend.
Creates document record in 'pending' status.
Returns upload URL, document ID, and expiration time.

Confirm S3/local upload completion.
Changes document status from 'pending' to 'active'.
Triggers document processing if needed.

get.description:
List accessible documents with filtering and pagination.
Returns documents filtered by user permissions and folder access.

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Full-text search on name and content
schema.title: Search

parameters.description: Full-text search on name and content

get.description: Get document details including metadata, versions, and permissions.

patch.description:
Update document metadata (name, tags, folder, status).
Requires write permission on document.

delete.description:
Soft delete document (can be recovered).
Requires write permission on document.

get.description:
Generate presigned S3/local download URL.
Includes permission check and audit logging.

parameters.name: version_number

schema.description: Specific version to download (defaults to latest)
schema.title: Version Number

parameters.description: Specific version to download (defaults to latest)

get.description:
Get document version history.
Returns all versions with metadata (size, uploaded by, timestamp, etc.).

Get explicit document-level permissions.
Requires admin permission on document.

schema.title: Response List Document Permissions Api V1 Dms Documents  Document Id  Permissions Get

post.description:
Grant explicit permission to user on document.
Requires admin permission on document.

delete.description:
Revoke explicit document permission.
Requires admin permission on document.

ChatMetadata.title: ChatMetadata
ChatMetadata.description: Model for the list of chats API response.

Token.title: Token
Token.description: Pydantic model for the JWT token response.

User.title: User
User.description: Pydantic model for returning a user (response).

UserCreate.title: UserCreate
UserCreate.description: Pydantic model for creating a new user.

UserProfileUpdate.title: UserProfileUpdate
UserProfileUpdate.description: Pydantic model for updating a user's profile.
